contentCreator.title: Content Creator
contentCreator.pageTitle: Ready to make everyone talk about your brand?
contentCreator.sectionTitle: Being there isn't enough. You need to be remembered.
contentCreator.paragraph1: Content is the face of your brand in the digital world. High-quality images, videos, graphics, and copy don't just grab attention: they tell people who you are, what you stand for, and why they should follow you. Unique, consistent, and never boring content turns a simple scroll into a memorable experience, where your audience doesn't just look, they connect, engage, and become part of your community.
contentCreator.paragraph2: The value of content isn't measured in likes or views alone, it's measured by how well it delivers the right message, sparks emotions, and drives people to take action. Sharp copy and strong calls-to-action complete the picture, turning creativity and strategy into real, tangible results.
contentCreator.paragraph3: An effective content strategy helps you stand out from the crowd, generate real engagement, build loyalty, and strengthen your brand identity. Every post becomes a marketing tool, an opportunity to attract new clients and turn them into loyal supporters, leaving a lasting impression and making your brand impossible to ignore.
contentCreator.whatYouNeedDescription: Having high-quality content that is consistent with the brand's identity is essential to be recognized and build an authentic connection with the audience. Well-designed, visually polished content that follows current trends helps capture attention, increase engagement, and strengthen the brand's credibility.
contentCreator.card1: Plan and develop texts, images, and videos designed to engage the target audience.
contentCreator.card2: Research trends, inspirations, and relevant topics to keep content up-to-date.
contentCreator.card3: Adapt content to different digital channels to maximize visibility and engagement.
contentCreator.card4: Create original, high-quality content that reflects the brand's identity and values.

graphicDesigner.title: Graphic Designer
graphicDesigner.pageTitle: You don't need a marketing strategy, if you haven't got a brand strategy.
graphicDesigner.sectionTitle: Your brand doesn't exist until it leaves a mark.
graphicDesigner.paragraph1: A clear and cohesive brand identity lets you be instantly recognizable, stand out from the competition, and convey professionalism and trust. When every element, from your logo to your colors, from your fonts to your tone of voice, speaks the same language, your audience immediately gets who you are and what you stand for. This builds trust, strengthens your reputation, and makes your products or services more desirable.
graphicDesigner.paragraph2: Uniqueness is just as important. In a market full of copycats and similar content, a brand with a strong, defined identity grabs attention and sticks in people's minds. Every visual and communication element becomes a concrete tool to tell your brand story and showcase your values.
graphicDesigner.paragraph3: A well-built brand identity isn't just about looking good, it's a strategic tool that constantly works for your brand. It helps unify campaigns, content, and strategies, creates a clear language with your audience, and ensures every interaction reinforces your message.
graphicDesigner.paragraph4: Investing in your identity doesn't just make you look more professional: it lays a solid foundation for growth, engagement, and long-term recognizability.
graphicDesigner.whatYouNeedDescription: A consistent brand identity allows your brand to be immediately recognizable, communicate its values clearly, and build trust with your audience, turning every touchpoint into a memorable experience.
graphicDesigner.card1: Use typography strategically to improve readability and impact.
graphicDesigner.card2: Integrate aesthetics and functionality to communicate the message clearly and directly.
graphicDesigner.card3: Create functional and engaging graphic content that is consistent with the brand's values.
graphicDesigner.card4: Develop consistent and strategic visual content to strengthen communication and increase engagement.

socialMediaManager.title: Social Media Manager
socialMediaManager.pageTitle: Stuck with your social media? Don't worry - I'm here to make your life easier.
socialMediaManager.scrollingText: Marketing is more than just an Instagram post
socialMediaManager.sectionTitle: If you're not seen, you don't exist. And on social media, there are no half measures.
socialMediaManager.paragraph1: Every post, every story, every piece of content you put out speaks for you. It tells people who you are, what you stand for, and how you want to be perceived. Social media isn't just about posts and likes: it's your brand's megaphone, the place where people decide in seconds whether they'll love you or scroll past.
socialMediaManager.paragraph2: Running your socials effectively means leaving nothing to chance. It means turning your brand identity into a cohesive, strategic, and engaging visual and narrative experience. It's about knowing your audience, understanding the messages that hit them, and choosing formats that grab their attention. Every like, comment, share, and view becomes an opportunity — to grow, to build authority, and to connect directly with people who could become clients, partners, or brand ambassadors.
socialMediaManager.paragraph3: The benefits of smart social media management are real and measurable. It's not just about looking good, it's about building trust, desire, and recognizability. A coherent, strategic profile boosts credibility, makes your products or services more desirable, and reaches the right audience at the right time.
socialMediaManager.paragraph4: Running your socials at their best turns them into a growth engine, driving engagement and real results. Simply being there isn't enough: you need to be unforgettable.
socialMediaManager.whatYouNeedDescription: Social media are an essential tool for brand communication. They allow you to convey your identity, share values, and create a direct connection with your audience, helping to strengthen visibility, recognition, and online positioning.
socialMediaManager.card1: A solid strategy to define clear and measurable goals on social media.
socialMediaManager.card2: A visual identity that ensures brand recognition on social media.
socialMediaManager.card3: Creating engaging content that is consistent with your brand's values.
socialMediaManager.card4: Defining a tone of voice to communicate your message clearly and effectively.

homeHeader.introTitle: Your brand is ready for a five-star makeover
homeHeader.headerTitle: Transform your brand into a unique, cohesive, and impossible-to-ignore presence.
homeHeader.subtitle: In a market where everyone speaks, we make sure you're heard.
homeHeader.scrollingText: Marketing is thinking, not just posting.

welcomeSection.title: Welcome to Studio Mua
welcomeSection.paragraph1: Through a strategic combination of Social Media Management, professional Content Creation, and bespoke Graphic Design, we build an image that doesn't just work, it stands out.
welcomeSection.paragraph2: We believe every brand deserves a digital presence that reflects its personality, values, and ambitions. That's why we develop authentic content, carefully curated visuals, and communication designed to generate engagement, strengthen brand identity, and increase visibility.
welcomeSection.paragraph3: With Studio Mua, your brand doesn't simply become "more beautiful": it becomes immediate, recognizable, and capable of attracting the right attention. It's the ideal choice for those who want to truly stand out, establish a strong social media presence, and build an engaged, loyal community.
welcomeSection.closingTitle: Because today, being present isn't enough: you need to leave a mark.

manifestoSection.title: Heya, I'm Cecilia!
manifestoSection.subtitle: I'm just a girl with ideas.
manifestoSection.paragraph1: I'm not here to follow trends — I'm here to create them.
manifestoSection.paragraph2: I design identities, shape imaginations, and turn shy brands into presences you can't ignore. I'm the one who sees first, imagines bigger, and brings it all to life with a style that doesn't ask for permission to exist.
manifestoSection.paragraph3: Graphics, content, socials, strategy — I take what you have and elevate it to places you never imagined, but where your brand truly belongs.
manifestoSection.paragraph4: In a world that moves fast, I grab attention. And I make it stay.

card1.title: Enthusiasm
card1.text: We pour energy and passion into every project, approaching every challenge with curiosity.

card2.title: Design with intention
card2.text: There is no beauty without substance. Every choice has a clear purpose: to communicate, excite, and leave an impact.

card3.title: Multidisciplinary
card3.text: Communication, design, strategy, and storytelling integrate to create coherent and comprehensive solutions.

card4.title: Original
card4.text: Every project is tailor-made: unique, recognizable, and never replicable.

card5.title: Bold, not random
card5.text: We push ourselves further, but with judgment. Boldness only makes sense when guided by vision, not chance.

card6.title: Attention
card6.text: We capture every detail and nuance, truly listening to transform ideas into concrete results.

graphicDesigner.title: Graphic Design
graphicDesigner.subtitle: Great brands aren't just seen (they're felt)
graphicDesigner.text: The best brand don't just look good. They move people. They create moments. They build legacies.

socialMediaManager.title: Social Media Manager
socialMediaManager.subtitle: Keeping up with every trend
socialMediaManager.text: Posting what aligns with your brand's values and resonates with your audience

contentCreator.title: Content creator
contentCreator.subtitle: Let your visual tell a story
contentCreator.text: People don't buy from you. They buy from the story you tell about them.
